response.snippet: Thank you very much!

extracted_snippet.original: Thank you very much!

reviews.snippet: We unfortunately discovered this restaurant too late during our trip to Japan. The atmosphere and food were very good. We were served very kindly. We came back the next day. Everything was very delicious; it’s a shame we didn’t find this restaurant earlier. Thank you very much!

extracted_snippet.original: We unfortunately discovered this restaurant too late during our trip to Japan. The atmosphere and food were very good. We were served very kindly. We came back the next day. Everything was very delicious; it’s a shame we didn’t find this restaurant earlier. Thank you very much!

response.snippet: Thank you so much for your kind words! We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed both the atmosphere and the food during your visit. We're sorry that you discovered us late in your trip, but we're glad you were able to come back the next day! We hope to welcome you again on your next visit to Japan. Thank you once again, and safe travels!

extracted_snippet.original: Thank you so much for your kind words! We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed both the atmosphere and the food during your visit. We're sorry that you discovered us late in your trip, but we're glad you were able to come back the next day! We hope to welcome you again on your next visit to Japan. Thank you once again, and safe travels!

reviews.snippet: A halal Uzbezkistan restaurant serving Japanese food.  It was my first time eating chicken katsu in Japan with rice (I use to eat it alone with sauce) and enjoy my dining experience in the restaurant.  The pomegranate and red cherry juices are fresh.  The restaurant was also very generous for adding fresh grilled beef kebab in our orders.

extracted_snippet.original: A halal Uzbezkistan restaurant serving Japanese food.  It was my first time eating chicken katsu in Japan with rice (I use to eat it alone with sauce) and enjoy my dining experience in the restaurant.  The pomegranate and red cherry juices are fresh.  The restaurant was also very generous for adding fresh grilled beef kebab in our orders.

We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your first experience with chicken katsu in Japan, as well as the fresh juices and grilled beef kebab. It’s great to know that you appreciated our generous touch. We look forward to welcoming you again for more delicious meals in the future!

reviews.snippet: We arrived to restaurant and they kicked us out while they're open because they have a company meeting after 2 hrs

extracted_snippet.original: We arrived to restaurant and they kicked us out while they're open because they have a company meeting after 2 hrs

response.snippet:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for visiting us. As we mentioned, the restaurant was reserved for a private event that day. We anticipated having tables available at 7 PM, and we sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

We hope you’ll consider joining us again for a relaxing dining experience. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Dear Guest,

We hope you’ll consider joining us again for a relaxing dining experience. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

reviews.snippet:
I recently had the pleasure of visiting Halal Sakura restaurant in Tokyo, Japan, and it was a fantastic experience from start to finish. Upon entering, I was immediately struck by the warm and inviting atmosphere, complemented by the friendly and welcoming staff who made me feel right at home. What stood out right away was the modern and convenient ordering system—everything was done through an online menu, which I found both impressive and efficient. It allowed for a seamless ordering process, giving me plenty of time to browse the various options without feeling rushed.

I was particularly excited to try the local cuisine from Tajikistan, and it did not disappoint. The flavors were incredible, with the meat perfectly cooked—tender, juicy, and full of rich, authentic taste. The rice, too, was a highlight, seasoned just right with a delightful balance of spices that complemented the meal beautifully. Every bite was a treat, and it was clear that a lot of care had gone into preparing each dish.

The fast service added to the overall great experience. My meal arrived promptly, and the attention to detail from the staff, combined with their warm hospitality, really elevated the dining experience. It’s rare to find a place that not only serves unique and delicious food but also makes you feel genuinely welcome and valued as a guest.

For anyone in Tokyo looking to enjoy a unique blend of flavors and a comfortable dining environment, Halal Sakura is a must-visit. The combination of delicious, authentic Tajik cuisine, speedy service, and friendly staff makes it an excellent choice for anyone seeking something a little different. I highly recommend it!

最近、東京にあるハラール サクラ レストランを訪れる機会に恵まれ、最初から最後まで素晴らしい体験ができました。店内に入ると、すぐに温かく居心地の良い雰囲気に圧倒され、フレンドリーで歓迎してくれるスタッフのおかげで、まるで自宅にいるかのようにくつろげました。すぐに目立ったのは、モダンで便利な注文システムです。すべてオンライン メニューで行われ、印象的で効率的だと感じました。注文プロセスがシームレスになり、急がされることなくさまざまなオプションを閲覧する十分な時間がありました。

特にタジキスタンの郷土料理を試すのが楽しみでしたが、期待を裏切りませんでした。味は素晴らしく、肉は完璧に調理され、柔らかく、ジューシーで、濃厚で本格的な味がいっぱいです。ご飯もハイライトで、スパイスの絶妙なバランスで味付けされており、食事によく合いました。一口ごとにごちそうになり、各料理の準備に多大な注意が払われていることがわかりました。

迅速なサービスも、全体的に素晴らしい体験をさらに引き立てました。 食事はすぐに届き、スタッフの細やかな配慮と温かいおもてなしのおかげで、食事の体験が本当に充実したものになりました。ユニークでおいしい料理を提供するだけでなく、ゲストとして心から歓迎され、大切にされていると感じられる場所を見つけるのはまれです。

東京でユニークな味の組み合わせと快適な食事環境を楽しみたいなら、Halal Sakura は必見です。おいしい本格的なタジク料理、迅速なサービス、フレンドリーなスタッフの組み合わせは、少し変わったものを求める人にとって素晴らしい選択です。強くお勧めします！

What stood right away was the modern and convenient ordering system—everything was done through an online menu, which I found both impressive and efficient. I was particularly excited to try the local cuisine from Tajikistan, and it did not disappoint. The flavors were incredible, with the meat perfectly cooked—tender, juicy, and full of rich, authentic taste. The rice, too, was a highlight, seasoned just right with a delightful balance of spices that complemented the meal beautifully. I recently had the opportunity to visit Halal Sakura Restaurant in Tokyo and it was an amazing experience from start to finish. Upon entering the store, I was immediately struck by the warm and inviting atmosphere, and the friendly and welcoming staff made me feel right at home. What immediately stood out was the modern and convenient ordering system. Everything was done through an online menu, which we found impressive and efficient. The ordering process was seamless and we had plenty of time to browse different options without feeling rushed.

I was especially looking forward to trying Tajikistan's local cuisine and it did not disappoint. The taste was amazing, the meat perfectly cooked, tender, juicy, rich and full of authentic flavour. The rice was also a highlight, seasoned with the perfect balance of spices and went well with the meal. Every bite was a feast and you could tell that a great deal of care was put into the preparation of each dish.

The quick service also added to an overall great experience. The food arrived quickly and the staff's attentiveness and warm hospitality made the dining experience truly fulfilling. It's rare to find a place that not only serves unique and delicious food, but also makes you feel truly welcomed and valued as a guest.

If you want to enjoy unique flavor combinations and a comfortable dining environment in Tokyo, Halal Sakura is a must-visit. The combination of delicious authentic Tajik food, quick service and friendly staff makes it a great choice for those seeking something a little different. Highly recommended!

Your recommendation means a lot to us, and we can’t wait to welcome you back for another memorable dining experience!

details.recommended_dishes: Soup, Beef Ramen, Lamb Soup, Fried Rice with Mutton

response.snippet: Katta rahmat!

extracted_snippet.original: Katta rahmat!

response.snippet: Katta rahmat!

extracted_snippet.original: Katta rahmat!

reviews.snippet:
Great halal restaurant that serves mostly Uzbek and Japanese food ! Plov and manty (Central Asian dishes) were delicious and the decoration is awesome too ! They also don’t serve alcohol which is great because a lot of central Asian restaurants don’t do that. People that work in the restaurant are really friendly 🥰. Hoping to go back there soon ! One of my favorite restaurants in Tokyo 😋 ❤️ 🇺🇿

There is also a praying room in the restaurant which is really neat ! 🕌 🧎‍♂️

Très bon restaurant halal qui sert majoritairement de la cuisine ouzbèke et japonaise ! Le plov et le manty (plats d’Asie centrale) étaient délicieux et la décoration était très belle également ! Ils ne servent pas d’alcool, ce qui est une bonne chose car les restaurants servant des plats d’Asie centrale servent souvent de l’alcool. Les gens qui travaillent dans le restaurant sont très amicaux. 🥰 J’espère y retourner bientôt ! L’un de mes restaurants préférés de Tokyo 😋 ❤️ 🇺🇿

Il y a aussi une salle de prière dans le restaurant, ce qui est vraiment pratique ! 🕌 🧎‍♂️

主にウズベキスタン料理と日本料理を提供する素晴らしいハラールレストランです。プロフとマンティ（中央アジア料理）は美味しかったし、装飾も素晴らしいです！また、中央アジアのレストランの多くはアルコールを提供していないので、これは素晴らしいことです。レストランで働く人々は本当にフレンドリーです🥰。すぐにそこに戻りたいと思っています!東京で私のお気に入りのレストランの 1 つ 😋 ❤️ 🇺🇿

私はオーストラリアのレストランで最高のおもてなしをします! 🕌 🧎‍♂️

우즈베키스탄과 일본 음식을 주로 제공하는 훌륭한 할랄 레스토랑! 플로브와 만티(중앙아시아 요리)가 맛있었고 장식도 굉장했습니다! 또한 많은 중앙아시아 레스토랑에서 제공하지 않는 알코올을 제공하지 않아서 좋았습니다. 레스토랑에서 일하는 사람들은 정말 친절합니다 🥰. 곧 다시 가고 싶습니다! 도쿄에서 가장 좋아하는 레스토랑 중 하나입니다 😋 ❤️ 🇺🇿

레스토랑에는 기도실도 있어서 정말 편리해요! 🕌 🧎‍♂️

很棒的清真餐廳，主要供應烏茲別克和日本料理！ Plov 和 manty（中亞菜餚）非常美味，而且裝飾也很棒！他們也不提供酒精飲料，這很好，因為許多中亞餐廳不提供酒精飲料。在餐廳工作的人都非常友善🥰。希望很快能回到那裡！我在東京最喜歡的餐廳之一😋❤️🇺🇿

餐廳裡還有祈禱室，真的很方便! 🕌 🧎‍♂️

Çoğunlukla Özbek ve Japon yemekleri servis eden harika bir helal restoran! Plov ve manty (Orta Asya yemekleri) lezzetliydi ve dekorasyon da harika! Ayrıca alkol servisi yapmıyorlar ki bu harika çünkü birçok Orta Asya restoranı bunu yapmıyor. Restoranda çalışan insanlar gerçekten cana yakın 🥰. Yakında tekrar gitmeyi umuyorum! Tokyo'daki en sevdiğim restoranlardan biri 😋 ❤️ 🇺🇿

Restoranda gerçekten kullanışlı bir mescit de var! 🕌 🧎‍♂️

Asosan o'zbek va yapon taomlarini taklif qiluvchi ajoyib halol restoran! Palov va manti (Markaziy Osiyo taomlari) juda mazali va bezaklari ham ajoyib! Ular, shuningdek, spirtli ichimliklarni taqdim etmaydilar, bu juda yaxshi, chunki ko'plab Markaziy Osiyo restoranlari buni qilmaydi. Restoranda ishlaydigan odamlar juda samimiy 🥰. Tez orada u erga qaytish umidida! Tokiodagi eng sevimli restoranlarimdan biri 😋 ❤️ 🇺🇿

Restoranda namozxona ham bor, bu juda qulay! 🕌 🧎‍♂️

Отличный халяльный ресторан, в котором в основном подают блюда узбекской и японской кухни! Плов и манты (блюда среднеазиатской кухни) были восхитительны, а оформление тоже потрясающее! Они также не подают алкоголь, что здорово, потому что во многих ресторанах среднеазиатской кухни этого не делают. Люди, работающие в ресторане, очень дружелюбны 🥰. Надеюсь вернуться туда снова! Один из моих любимых ресторанов в Токио 😋 ❤️ 🇺🇿

Еще в ресторане есть молельная комната, что очень удобно! 🕌 🧎‍♂️

Asosan o'zbek va yapon taomlarini taklif qiluvchi ajoyib halol restoran! Palov va manti (Markaziy Osiyo taomlari) juda mazali va bezaklari ham ajoyib! Ular, shuningdek, spirtli ichimliklarni taqdim etmaydilar, bu juda yaxshi, chunki ko'plab Markaziy Osiyo restoranlari buni qilmaydi. Restoranda ishlaydigan odamlar juda samimiy 🥰. Tez orada u erga qaytish umidida! Tokiodagi eng sevimli restoranlarimdan biri 😋 ❤️ 🇺🇿

Restoranda namozxona ham bor, bu juda qulay! 🕌 🧎‍♂️

Отличный халяльный ресторан, в котором в основном подают блюда узбекской и японской кухни! Плов и манты (блюда среднеазиатской кухни) были восхитительны, а оформление тоже потрясающее! Они также не подают алкоголь, что здорово, потому что во многих ресторанах среднеазиатской кухни этого не делают. Люди, работающие в ресторане, очень дружелюбны 🥰. Надеюсь вернуться туда снова! Один из моих любимых ресторанов в Токио 😋 ❤️ 🇺🇿

Еще в ресторане есть молельная комната, что очень удобно! 🕌 🧎‍♂️
extracted_snippet.translated:
Great halal restaurant that serves mostly Uzbek and Japanese food! Plov and manty (Central Asian dishes) were delicious and the decoration is awesome too! They also don't serve alcohol which is great because a lot of central Asian restaurants don't do that. People that work in the restaurant are really friendly. Hoping to go back there soon! One of my favorite restaurants in Tokyo 😋 ❤️ 🇺🇿

There is also a praying room in the restaurant which is really neat! 🕌 🧎‍♂️

Très bon restaurant halal qui sert majoritairement de la cuisine ouzbèke et japonaise ! Le plov et le manty (plats d’Asie centrale) était délicieux et la decoration était très belle également ! Ils ne servent pas d'alcool, ce qui est une bonne thinge car les restaurants servant des plats d'Asie centrale servent souvent de l'alcool. Les gens qui travailente dans le restaurant sont très amicaux. 🥰 J'espère y retourner bientôt ! L'un de mes restaurants préférés de Tokyo 😋 ❤️ 🇺🇿

Il y a aussi une salle de prière dans le restaurant, ce qui est vraiment pratique ! 🕌 🧎‍♂️

extracted_snippet.translated: Although there were many dishes that I had never tried before, they were all very delicious and didn't have any strange tastes and were well-suited to the Japanese palate! It was quite busy for lunch, so it might be best to make a reservation on Fridays and Saturdays.
